name: PDF Viewer
description: PDF Viewer is a component for reading and displaying PDF files.

properties.name: pdfUrl
properties.label: PDF URL
properties.handlerDescription: This is the handler for the logic to determine the PDF URL.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows write URL of PDF file, but file must be in Backendless Files.

properties.name: width
properties.label: Width
properties.handlerDescription: This is the handler for the logic to determine the width of the PDF Viewer.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows determine the width of the PDF Viewer.

properties.name: height
properties.label: Height
properties.handlerDescription: This is the handler for the logic to determine the height of the PDF Viewer.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows determine the height of the PDF Viewer.

properties.name: scale
properties.label: Scale in %
properties.settingTooltip: Allows determine the default scale value in percentage.

properties.name: showPrintButton
properties.label: Show Print Button
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if the print button should be visible. If the handler returns true, the component will be visible.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows determine if the print button should be visible. If the handler returns true, the component will be visible.

properties.name: showDownloadButton
properties.label: Show Download Button
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if the download button should be visible. If the handler returns true, the component will be visible.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows determine if the download button should be visible. If the handler returns true, the component will be visible.

eventHandlers.name: onLoadSuccess
eventHandlers.label: On Load Success
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered when the PDF file is successfully downloaded

eventHandlers.name: onLoadError
eventHandlers.label: On Load Error
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered when a PDF download error
